homeTitle: Your trip with ADA taxi is convenient, fast and reliable
homeDes: Travel at affordable prices as a passenger through our platform or have the opportunity to earn high income as a driver!
whyAda: Why is it convenient to work with ADA Taxi?
usuallyDes1: No need to wait for hours at the taxi stands. You will find a driver and a passenger in just a few minutes through the application.
usuallyDes2: Payment is easy, clear and transparent! Pay in cash or online through ADA TAXI, know the price in advance and avoid overpayments.
usuallyDes3: You can choose additional services such as air conditioning, luggage, and traveling with pets.
usuallyDes4: Trusted and highly rated drivers and you can track your driver in real time. This will give you and your loved ones peace of mind.
appDriver: Download the ADA Taxi driver app!
appDriverDes: Dear driver! It will now be much easier for you to find a client, negotiate a price and organize a trip. ADA TAXI is a modern platform that connects passengers traveling from region to region and reliable drivers.
appClient: Download the ADA Taxi passenger application!
appClientDes: Do you often travel from region to region? Now forget about looking for a taxi, expensive taxis or unclear routes! ADA TAXI is a platform that connects you with reliable drivers.
countDes: We are proud of our clients and partners who have trusted us!!!
formTitle: Find easy intercity passengers and drivers!
formDes1: Fill out the application to become a driver or contact us
name: Your full name
alert1: Your information has been sent! Our admin will contact you shortly.
alert2: Please enter your details in full!
appClientWeb: Use the ADA Taxi passenger website!
appClientDesWeb: Now ordering through this website is even easier. Go to your computer's browser and type client.adataxi.uz and register. Then you can order for any route.
